item.title: Sevillian-style spinach with chickpeas
item.description: Prepare the Spinach: If using fresh spinach, wash and blanch it briefly in boiling water, then drain. If using frozen spinach, thaw and drain well. Toast the Garlic: Heat a skillet over medium heat with olive oil. Fry the garlic cloves until golden but not burnt. Cook the Spinach and Chickpeas: In the skillet, add a bit more olive oil if necessary. Add the spinach and chickpeas and saut√© for a few minutes.
